text: Basi ni jwaatulwisye (pa uchimbichimbi wao) mwakwanyenjelela. Basi pandema jawapasyisye (isogosi ya) chitelacho, waonechele kukwao umakonope wao, ni watandite kulinyambatika masamba ga mu Litimbemo, ni jwaawilasile M'mbuje gwao (juchitiji): “Ana nganinankanya wanawawilimmwe achi chitelachi, ni kunsalila kuti chisimu shetani kukwenu ni mmagongo jwakuonechela?”
